enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: The SBI contact group on the SCCF convened in the afternoon, with Co-Chair Ojoo-Massawa noting that the aim was to finish negotiations on draft SBI conclusions for a COP decision (FCCC/SBI/2004/L.25).
SOUTH AFRICA, CANADA and Portugal, for the EU, said the text provided a useful basis for discussions.
The EU said the two first operative paragraphs, on activities supported by the SCCF, are key to a final agreement.
He said text on economic diversification would require further clarification.
An informal meeting will take place on Monday afternoon.
